title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 17
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: It happened, however, that aday or two previously to his leaving, a party of pleasure was planned forvisiting Kellie Law, near Carnbee, and Macduff's Cave, near Earlsferry.

title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: None of these ferries, hoAvever,equals in storied interest the crossing-place between Earlsferry andNorth BerAvick.
